body:
Comment 1: 
Sorry, this doesn't give us much to work with.

Even after figuring out how to read a *.7z file, the strace-looking output doesn't have
anything obviously wrong with it.

I see some blocks of:

select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0

select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0
select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0

select(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xB0080A48)           = 0 0

... which looks a bit weird.  But there's still activity going on also.

Please try to narrow down the test case.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
